create.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE IF NOT EXISTS block ( hash BINARY(32) not null, prev_hash BINARY(32) not null, index BINARY(4) not null, block LONGVARBINARY not null )
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_block_hash ON block (hash)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_block_prev_hash ON block (prev_hash)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_block_index ON block (index)
CREATE CACHED TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transaction ( block_index BINARY(4) not null, transaction_index BINARY(2) not null, transaction_hash BINARY(32) not null, transaction LONGVARBINARY not null )
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_index_hash ON transaction (block_index,transaction_hash)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_index_index ON transaction (block_index,transaction_index)

CREATE CACHED TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transaction_output ( block_index BINARY(4) not null, transaction_index BINARY(2) not null, transaction_output_index BINARY(2) not null, asset_id BINARY(32) not null, value BINARY(8) not null, script_hash BINARY(20) not null )
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_output_index ON transaction_output (block_index,transaction_index,transaction_output_index)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_output_script_hash ON transaction_output (script_hash)

CREATE CACHED TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transaction_input ( block_index BINARY(4) not null, transaction_index BINARY(2) not null, transaction_input_index BINARY(4) not null, prev_transaction_hash BINARY(32) not null, prev_transaction_output_index BINARY(2) not null )
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_input_index ON transaction_input (block_index,transaction_index,transaction_input_index)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_input_prev ON transaction_input (prev_transaction_hash,prev_transaction_output_index)

CREATE CACHED TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transaction_script ( block_index BINARY(4) not null, transaction_index BINARY(2) not null, transaction_script_index BINARY(4) not null, invocation_script LONGVARBINARY not null, verification_script LONGVARBINARY not null )
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ix_transaction_script_index ON transaction_script (block_index,transaction_index,transaction_script_index)

getBlockWithIndex.sql: select block from block where index = ?

getBlockWithHash.sql: select block from block where hash = ?

getBlockWithMaxIndex.sql: select block from block where index = (select max(index) from block) limit 1

getTransactionsWithIndex.sql: select transaction from transaction where block_index = ? order by transaction_index asc

putTransactionOutput.sql: insert into transaction_output ( block_index, transaction_index, transaction_output_index, asset_id, value, script_hash ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)

getTransactionOutputsWithIndex.sql: select transaction_index,asset_id,value,script_hash from transaction_output where block_index = ? order by transaction_index, transaction_output_index asc

putTransactionInput.sql: insert into transaction_input ( block_index, transaction_index, transaction_input_index, prev_transaction_hash, prev_transaction_output_index ) values (?,?,?,?,?)

getTransactionInputsWithIndex.sql: select transaction_index,prev_transaction_hash,prev_transaction_output_index from transaction_input where block_index = ? order by transaction_input_index asc

putTransactionScript.sql: insert into transaction_script ( block_index, transaction_index, transaction_script_index, invocation_script, verification_script ) values (?,?,?,?,?)

getTransactionScriptsWithIndex.sql: select transaction_index,invocation_script,verification_script from transaction_script where block_index = ? order by transaction_script_index asc
